title: Barbecue baby back ribs with celeriac slaw
description: Good things come to those who wait, and these fall-apart, slow-cooked ribs are no exception.
ingredients: 2kg/2lb 4oz baby back pork ribs, in racks
2 red chillies, cut in half lengthways
1 garlic bulb, cut in half horizontally
1 celeriac, julienned and placed in acidulated water
2 tbsp roughly chopped fresh flatleaf parsley
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
